metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45885 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9. drivers/media/dvb-core/dvb_frontend.c has a race condition that can cause a use-after-free when a device is disconnected.

notes.Note: sbeattie> unfixed upstream as of 2023.09.01 exploiting this vulnerability requires disconnecting a DVB device, which is why this has been prioritized as low. SUSE bug report claims 4172385b0c9a ("media: dvb-core: Fix use-after-free due on race condition at dvb_net") is applied for this and reverted, but actually 6769a0b7ee0c ("media: dvb-core: Fix use-after-free on race condition at dvb_frontend") is meant and was reverted in ec21a38df77a.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.09.01').
linux-allwinner package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.

linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
